SEARCH
Package edu.uiowa.cs.warp

Class ViewMenu

java.lang.Object
edu.uiowa.cs.warp.ViewMenu
public class ViewMenu extends Object
Creates the menu for all Warp visualizations and provides methods that can be called by a controller to attached listeners to the menu items. This is a view class in a Model-View-Controller software pattern. It is intended that the actual creation and display of the visualizations will be done in a controller object.
Version:
2.0 Fall 2025
Author:
sgoddard

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewMenu

      public ViewMenu()
      Constructor to create the menu from which Warp visualizations can be requested. Need to call getMenu() to retrieve the menu built and attach it to a parent menu bar. The name displayed for the menu can be changed by calling menu.setText(), as it is a JMenu.

  • Method Details

    • getMenu

      public JMenu getMenu()
      Returns the menu built so that it can be attached to a menu bar.
      Returns:
      the menu built

    • buildMenu

      private void buildMenu(String title)
      Creates and builds Warp View menu.
      Parameters:
      title - is name displayed for the menu.
